Uses of Class
Director

    • Uses of Director in <Unnamed>

      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as Director 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Director MediaMaker.director
      If this MediaMaker is an Director, this is their Actor tag
      Fields in <Unnamed> with type parameters of type Director 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Director> Media.directors
      Stores a list of all directors for a Media object
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Director 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Director> Media.getDirectors()
      Allows a Media objects list of directors to be accessed.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Director 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Media.addDirector(Director d)
      Mutator method that adds a directors name to a Media objects list of directors.
      void MediaModel.addObject(Director d)
      This method adds Director objects to the model
      void MediaModel.deleteObject(Director obj)
      This method will delete all instances of the specified Director object
      void MediaModel.editObject(Director newDirector, MediaMaker oldDirector)
      This method edits the specified Director objects by replacing all old instances of the Director with the new edited version
      void MediaMaker.setDirector(Director director)
      This method will set the Director if this MediaMaker is a Director in some Media
